docs.title: 🧠 Biomechanics UdeA
docs.text:
This website hosts the educational material for:

  • Human Biomechanics
  • Computational Biomechanics
  • Student research groups and gait lab projects

Here you will find laboratory guides, open-source software tutorials, OpenSim models, and anonymized datasets used for teaching and research.

docs.title: 🚀 Quick Access
docs.text: -   :material-human-walk:{ .lg .middle } **Biomechanics of Human Movement**       Overview, lab sessions, and gait tutorials.       [:octicons-arrow-right-16: Open](biomechanics.md)  -   :material-laptop:{ .lg .middle } **Computational Biomechanics**       Workflows, models, and FEM tutorials.       [:octicons-arrow-right-16: Open](computational_biomechanics.md)  -   :material-database:{ .lg .middle } **Datasets**       Small anonymized datasets.       [:octicons-arrow-right-16: Open](datasets.md)

docs.title: 🔧 Areas of Work
docs.text:
• Gait laboratory Motion capture, basic instrumentation, and introductory analysis sessions.

  • Modeling and simulation Musculoskeletal models, OpenSim workflows, and numerical experiments.

  • Design and prototyping CAD models, STL files for orthoses and prostheses, and 3D-printable parts.

docs.title: Instructor
docs.text: Juliana Uribe Pérez Biomedical Engineering Program – University of Antioquia
